did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Graduation programs, alumni reunion program, alumni directory for Dryden High School.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: W. Franklin Moore was president of the Freeville public schools in the early 1920s.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Graduation programs, alumni reunion program, alumni directory (1917) for Dryden High School; items concerning Dryden Union School and Academy, including a program for eighth grade graduation (1896) and a broadside advertising a "historical allegory and tableaux" to be presented by students (November 1892); and annual informational catalogs on Dryden Union School, 1884-1886 and 1889-1890. Also, leaflet listing teachers and students in the Freeville Public Schools, 1922, and letterhead for the 1921-1922 school year, listing the Freeville school board and teachers.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: W. Franklin Moore, Collector. Dryden and Freeville Schools Collection, #1932. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

unittitle.extref: Link to a partial PDF finding aid.

scopecontent.p: All the material in the collection may not be covered by this guide.
